Text: 2016 MTV Movie Awards:  In addition, this year also became the first since the 2006 MTV Movie Awards not to be aired live as the event was pre-recorded on April 9 prior to its April 10 date and the first since the 2003 MTV Movie Awards to include two hosts instead of one.
